Text: Ring Ring! The alarm is going off.
Where do you want to go?
You head to the living room
There's a lot of cool stuff here. What caught your eye?

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Oh yeah, that's that globe mama got me last year. As soon as I finish school, I'm outta here and traveling the world.

speaker: DeAndre
Text: DeAndre: Hey Nelson! Get down from there! Damn furball just does what he wants...lucky cat.
Donovan Huey has been released from prison after only 4 months behind bars.
Huey was arrested after having sexually assaulted an unconscious woman at a fraternity party.
His release was met with outrage from the public, many of which believed he deserved a much longer sentence.
The story is still in development. More details to come.
